wild_boar.name: a wild boar
wild_boar.description: You see a small, stout boar looking for something to eat. Mottled fur covers the boar's backside and one of its tusks is badly chipped. It greedily looks at you.

text.move_in_text: A wild boar rushes into the area.
text.engage_text: A wild boar stamps its feet.
text.death_text: A wild boar staggers and eventually slumps to the ground, motionless.
text.leave_text: A wild boar rushes off through the trees.
